Articles.Content: I'm relatively new to this game and I'm interested to see where it takes me.
Welcome to the forums, he with the cat-vatar.

Where will it take you? 

> 
> To infinity, and BEYOND!

Seriously, if you summon the Kraken, you will go to infinity, at ![I+was+scrolling+at+a+LUDICROUS+SPEED+_835d8a4d0b87352a563bb22f5a39a002.jpg](http://static2.fjcdn.com/comments/I+was+scrolling+at+a+LUDICROUS+SPEED+_835d8a4d0b87352a563bb22f5a39a002.jpg)
